prompt:
Use case: chapter 1 cinematic beat
Primary request: The camera glides toward a monumental cream library wall while a teal sentinel statue faces it in silence
Scene/background: near-black stage framing with one illuminated library facade
Subject: library wall and one stylized teal sentinel figurine
Action: slow forward dolly as mint contour lines awaken on the shelves
Camera: 35mm, centered dolly-in, stable motion
Lighting/mood: soft top-left key and subtle teal rim
Color palette: cream white, muted teal, deep navy
Style/format: premium minimal bas-relief cinematic render
Timing/beats: beat 1 reveal, beat 2 contour pulse, beat 3 hold
Constraints: single focal subject cluster, no dense text, no watermark
Avoid: flicker, jitter, stock footage look, oversaturated neon
